remarks: Value of the order topology for a preset.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Sep-2015.)
statement:
ordtNEW.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
ordtNEW.l $e |- .<_ = ( ( le ` K ) i^i ( B X. B ) ) $.
ordtposval.e $e |- E = ran ( x e. B |-> { y e. B | -. y .<_ x } ) $.
ordtposval.f $e |- F = ran ( x e. B |-> { y e. B | -. x .<_ y } ) $.
ordtprsval $p |- ( K e. Preset -> ( ordTop ` .<_ ) = ( topGen ` ( fi ` ( { B } u. ( E u. F ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d .<_ x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d K x y $.
